channel.title: Japan on Mai Hoang Duc
channel.description: Recent content in Japan on Mai Hoang Duc

item.title: Sendai's trip
item.description: Hello every one! Today I will talk about my very first trip to attend a conference at Tohoku University. This trip contain of so many first things of mine. First time to Sendai, JAPAN First time go to the conference Me and my senior at the beginning of the conference: In this conference I met a very talent girl and boy from Ho Chi Minh and a very humor friend from Yokohama the news about VJSE First time travel by Shinkansen
